text: Just checkin' it out!

This place is in not what we hoped for. The curtains don't close so the light comes right in. They're not broken, they are not designed to. Found an old muffin in the closet, yup a muffin. Been thee a long time too. Lamp doesn't work etc etc. Great location but that's it.

The hotel is run down but the rooms are large. You would think that at the prices they charge they would check to make sure all the lights work. The beds are in need of replacing. You might also think that a 3 inch gap at the bottom of the door might be a tad abnormal. Definitely substandard for a service oriented business.
By the way, y a un spa ici...
Dim sum tous les jours 11h30 a 14h, 2h de parking gratuit!
Excelente localização
Corner suite on the 8th floor is HUGE. 1.5 baths, living room + bedroom. No mini fridge or microwave though.
Great location for walking everywhere. China town, Old town and shopping district.
Ils prennent les commandes pour emporter. Parfait pour un souper tranquille à la maison sans trop d'effort.
Amazingly decorated rooms, great deals on hotwire.
Good location. Nice & clean rooms. Valet is super easy!
great customer service. rooms nice and clean. placed inside of a commercial centre. overall good
Breakfast in club room had eggs that looked like they were made from powder. Pushbutton coffee machine that makes you pine for filter.
Awesome lunch here.
wanted to like but wasn't impressed. Horrid borscht, uninspired schnitzel and okay pierogies. Best part was peach strudel. 2*
Everything clearly made by hand. A little short handed for the rainy day rush but worth the wait.
One of the few restaurants kitchen is sill open late (after 11pm). the cabbage sausage soup and perogie is not bad. Ambience is nice
Delicious. You will not be disappointed!
The last Polish restaurant in Montreal.  Been here for at least 40 years.  Schnitzel,  pierogies,  bagos,  etc.
Great food, service, and atmosphere! My waiter was excellent. Food came fast and was so delicious. I would come here if I visit Montreal again.
Very nice place.  Good food, good portions, and a great friendly staff.
This place is amazing! Great food!
Old world decor, contemporary pianist (playing "Hotel California," no less), bilingual waiters, and delicious dishes. What's not to love?
Perogies are dreamy. Rye soup could really use a side of warm bread.

Pour le deuxième fois nous sommes ici. On a juste fini demander les plats maintenant, mais je me sen pas bien parce que l'attitude de ce serveuse est très mal. C'est une première fois que je sen ça dans les restaurants à Montréal.

Courteous, helpful and knowledgable about their products. Can sometimes feel a bit pushy about products. Enormous and magnificient collection of hats and scarfs, however small collection of gloves, but all of very good quality. Highly recommended if you are ready for quality. Stay away if not.
Henri Henri, le plus grand chapelier au Canada. Sans aucun doute on y trouve notre bonheur!
If you know what you are looking for, be clear about it. If you don't, let them help you. If you think you are not made to wear a hat, they love a challenge.
Good place I'd like to come
Variety
Chicken
Lovely sandwich counter with awesome baked good!
This is the epicurean emporium for different varieties of cheese, sausage, olive, salts, oils, pasta, sauces etc!
Can't recommend.  Should have known better as soon as I realized it was a chain.
Afternoon snack
closed.
Location is closed. There's another one on St Catherine nearby.
Slow
Free small coffee with checkin if you buy a sandwich.
This place has always the same problem: their bad customer service.
Croissants in the morning!
Croissant + Café!
Beau temps !
Miam! Miam!
Croissants, Café et un bon bouquin (Au delà de la religion, Andréa Richard, Éditions du Septentrion) lu sur mon iPad
Croissants & Café + Le Devoir
Croissants, café + conversations
Croissants et Café au lait.
I an the Duke (Yelp), the Boss (Loopt star) and the Mayor (Foursquare) of this place.  Soup and sandwich with Latté.
Mayor (Foursquare), Boss (Loopt Star) and Duke (Yelp). Croissants, Café et Soduku du Devoir.
This coffee shop had been relocated 250 meters to the east. Its new location is 1654 rue Sainte-Catherine Est.
Excellent petit déjeuner.
Food is excellent! Looks very inconspicuous but really great tasting dishes.
Check out their flyer online before heading out.
No coconut bacon here,boo hoo
Le litre de Kombucha à 6.99 jusqu'au 29 mai! On fait des réserves!
Hmm delicieux
Maple
Their Maple cotton candy is to die for!!!
Good breakfast. The poutine matinale is tasty and generous. Friendly staff. Inexpensive place for brunch.
Caramel cupcake....and maple gelato. Period.
Maple syrup museum..
Cute, pretty standard dessert
Had the maple delight. It was pretty good, not to sweet :-)
had their maple green tea, maple black tea and iced maple syrup

Too busy to shop comfortably and a little expensive 
Maple good anywhere in Quebec
Doesn't take AmEx.
Good quality fast food Asian style
Greygoose on ice....
Un joyaux de Montreal
Over the top!!!
Snooty
À essayer les jarrets et choucroutes et la bière ambrée
Bonne bière bonne bouffe
Les 3 Braisseurs et la bière, vraiment synonymes. Essayez les moules à la provençale aussi. À la fin, le café gourmand.
Wow this place is packed! They seem to air every CH games, the atmosphere is great!
Pretty good sangria!
This place is horrible! Douche bag food no taste so much attitude
For starters try the nachos & spicy popcorn shrimp. Thank me later.
Clothing - size small

According to the only rated review I was afraid of wasting my money there but hey, you can go eat sushi knowing your investment WILL be worth it
Try both of the chicken dishes and didn't like it though...
Stick to sushi!!
Despite being 1500kms from the ocean, the sushi at Atami is fresh and delicious. The Tango Mango is fantastic.
Try their specialities! Especially the Tuna Tatake, Orchid Salad, Tango Mango & Volcano!
Best sushi in town
The best hot chocolate in town!
Great mochachino!
Always busy but often has open seats. People seem to get to to go here more than staying.
Green apple smoothie!
Clean coffee shop. A bit on the corporate cookie cutter side but the espresso is good and there is free wifi. Everybody wins
Hot coffee on a cold day...bam!
Work site 402
2 members at the concierge seemed to be annoyed that I spoke to them in English instead of french.
vp meeting
Really nice lobby and shops.  Extremely friendly staff that help you have a nice time.
Great hotel !! Centrally located and very nice in all facets !! Can't go wrong staying here, that's for sure !!
Great club sandwich served in the bar

The complimentary breakfast is a sham! A cup of coffee n a croissant is their continental breakfast! U can't take cereals or fruits instead. If someone is kind enough to let u substitute d croissant for cereals,mind u, only one bowl of cereals. if u take one more of their only available 'small sized cup' of cereals, they dump a $9 on you! 
For a hotel that charges you $$$, and inspite of being a whatever status here, shame on them for imposing such an unbecoming experience on us! Ruined our day!
The door man was amazing! Customer service was overall exceptional. Great stay.
Perfect apple tart, not so large selection of entrees but all are done well
**2nd** Best GT you can find downtown
As seen in Epic Egg Roll on Epic Meal Time. 2nd best General Tao in city as rated by Montreal Gazette
Lattes d'hiver !!
Comfy chairs and the usual swill.
In between two trains, for a meeting or just to grab a hot white cocoa with whipped cream (my personal favorite)! ;)
Don't bother to go to parent-teacher nights. You will wait in lines all night and be lucky to see even 1 or 2 teachers. Email teachers directly instead if you need to talk to them.
Restaurant burned down and has had opening soon sign for a long time with no sign of life. Sad but my guess is it's gone forever and ever.
Great nice and cheap indian place!
Bring your own wine.
My favorite Indian restaurant of Montreal.
Essayez les plateaux repas le midi: vraiment abordable et vous serez rempli jusquau soir !
Great portion with very cheap prices, the lunch specials are available until 4:30 pm!
I loved their food so yumm,, the spices were perfect
Food is amazing, service is not. But don't let that dissuade you.
Good pizza and beer selection
Micro brassuer is apparently microbrewery!!!!
Crowded at 12:30. Especially the patio.
Love their burger!!!
Good appetizer and beer!
Try the Le Quebec poutine, really nice. The golden bear is a nice accompaniment.
J'amais déçu!
The peppy "pizza" is good. Avoid the Italian, the sausage is scarce and bland.
Ne pas choisir L'assiette bruschetta et bâtonnets de fromage.  Les bruschettas n'étaient pas bons dutout.
Would help if I spoke French...
Une petite bière en cette chaude journée !
Great beer selection , nice ambiance and good service.. Food options are interesting
Friendly fun atmosphere. I would recommend to my friends.
Good  beer!!

First time ever in Montreal and this is the first place I picked. It's located in a really cool part of town. Very friendly staff. Yes they speak English and French of course. Their beers are really good and so is the food. I went with a flat bread pizza. Very good choice. If you want a nice casual place to hang out. Come here. I bet this place is awesome when the Habs are playing!  
Sorry but for me. Go Hawks!!
Come ready to eat and have a pint!!!!
Very bad service! Waiting too long to get the order! I cant imagine to wait for the order!
Très très bruyant. Trop bruyant. Même si la Flammekuche Moulin rouge vaut le détour.
Fun a atmosphere. Great staff. Good food and drink.
very friendly (and gorgeous) servers, awesome atmosphere, great beer! pretty good food for a pub/sports bar type of place and huge servings ..
Les frites à la bière sont un délice a partager. Mariage idéal avec un pinte quelconque !
Enjoyable experience! Great food, beer and service.
No. Didn't like the environment and I wasn't crazy about the food either
Poutine was great. I had the duck confit and didn't disappointed at all.
Who, in the 21st century, doesn't take interac and tells you to use the ATM? I mean, WTF!
Guinness, naturally.
Sit downstairs when there is a band playing. A lot of fun with a group of friends.
If you're hungry after 10pm, you can order from Zestos! They deliver here and they're cool with it!
The Old Dublin will be good spot to watch the playoffs! Trust me! GO HABS GO!
Food is good but otherwise kind of lame. Usually not a big crowd at night time
Happening atmosphere BUT no cocktails .... Seriously
Having a good cheap 5-7 beer
You can skate without your gloves, tuque, winterjacket, long undies, lipsol and sunglasses. You just lost 10 lbs.
Come to ice skate here!
Public washrooms by the skating rink
Its good for ice skating downtown
4 employees and 1 hour later to sell me a proyector...
If you need something here because you forgot say a charging cord on a trip. Go for if. Big purchases go online or to a bestbuy. The service here sucked.
Delish! Best smoked meat in Montreal.
I would like to rate it 10 * if I can!! Way better than Schwartz!
Absolutely divine smoked meat!
Examen droit international bonsoir!
Good food and tea. Relaxed atmosphere.  Cool in the summer.
Closed! Replaced by Mei, a dumpling restaurant. Don't order bubble tea from this new restaurant!!!! They don't know what they're doing!
Delicious thin crust pizza!
My favorite pizza in montreal downtown area !!
You can add fresh arugula to any pizza. It's amazing!
#12 Salsiccia
Closes at 1030 but they will deliver till 11
Great selection of pizza and salad. It's a little chaotic/noisy during peak, but good service. If in a small group, they can split your orders to share.
Best pizza in Montreal
Excellent pizza. We are from Toronto and went here based on reviews. Great toppings. We liked the "carre Phillips " pizza.
Best pizza en ville
Best pizza in Montreal, hands down.
Plan to have your takeout done in a flash.  There will be little to no time to drool over the drinks/wine list.
Avoid the washrooms unless you wanna loose your lunch.
Great pizza, great salads, great service, great terrace, great restaurant.
C'est platte pas de place !
75 different pizzas!
Suuuuuper busy at lunch time.
Loved it and will definitely come back!
Really good pizza. There were line on Friday night. Staff is really Friend
You can enjoy a 1/2 litre of wine with an excellent pizza for $30 on a great patio in the historic and bustling St Phillips's Square. What's not to love?
Over 75 choices of pizza. I usually get a pizza and salad combo.
Really good pizza. There were line on Friday night. Staff is really Friend
La meilleure pizza à Montréal, près du centre des spectacles.
Remember to bring cash when you go into the park because there's no place that takes debit card, and you're pretty much stuck to using their ATMs, which charges $3 service fee.
fermé en hiver :-((
les mercredis whisky! Le bowmore est classe !!
Ordered medium rare sirloin steak with salad and vegetable on the side. The steak is a little tough and server forgot our appetizer. Overall not a bad experience, nice atmosphere.
Good beer
Great beer and food. Perfect for post shopping or pre- hockey!
Great flatbread menu to go along with awesome brews.  La blanche=A+
correct comme place lais le portions de frites avec les hamburger sont vraiment petites
Nice patio, great selection of beers.
Great service --- wish I had found it sooner
Loud, festive and wonderful food.
The beer flights are very good, got tipsy. Loved the beer n cheddar soup
Love the beer, food is typical at best
The Elvis is where it's at.

Pancakes have a nice crispy exterior and a fluffy interior.  Home fries are also crispy and fried with fresh dill. Elvis platter with peanut butter bacon rolled pancakes are also amazing.  Coffee is terrible. Tacky decor with Marilyn Munroe art, Dali laminates and fake plants hanging from ceiling. At least it's clean. Never disappointed.
Excellent breakfast, the ownership try to be kind, the man is so kind...
Great location
Still nothing to rave about.

Two great pizza's are:

The B&M Special
The vegetarian with asparagus.

Pizza great. 
Slow delivery.   Woman who answers the phone is very cranky. Don't be surprised if she hangs up the phone loudly in your ear. Other food expensive and not so good.
I used to order delivery from here (Sherbrooke street) all the time but stopped after asking for Italian sausage on my pizza, instead of pepperoni, and got hot dogs...just gross.
PADI Diving courses are offered here with TotalDiving
#scuba course.
Total Diving courses are offered here   #scuba
L'option 3 d'aujourd'hui c'est en équipe! Yay!
Le dimanche matin, il y a une session spéciale pour ceux qui feront les Open.
Pour les débutants, les cours Phase 1 sont une très bonne introduction au Crossfit.
They have amazing bottled green olives here

If you are serious about making an epic Martini then you should come here to stock up on their ginormous and delicious Cerignola olives. Red or green they add majesty and panache to your cocktail.  Also: they have fresh pasta and sauces that take you back to the old country and the simple and delicious meals of the time.
Burrata time!
This Canadian Tire is super spacious and stacked!
BYOB that is 'deceptively' large enough for big groups!
Yum!
returns lineup must start at 9am!
Better go on your day off because it's one long line after another.
Amazing customer service.
Déjeuners 1$ avant 11:00
$3.99 Swedish meatballs are on Mondays!
Come early and bring a snack!
if you don't have your Christmas tree yet, real trees are free until Christmas, Dec 21 to 25
Show up at 4:30 on the weekends.  This will force you to be efficient enough to clear your "to buy" list in 30 minutes
Do NOT, I repeat, Do NOT buy your bed here. Anything else, fine. But buy your bed somewhere else.
This is the worst experience  I have encountered  from this restaurant. The service is very bad they treat us like third wold country be aware of the red hair assistant manager I will never come back
Horrible service,very slow and not fresh food,go to Brossard one,way much better
the stuff at cashier must be a joke, The food is mediocre, not worth my time.
Their icing is so light it doesn't weigh down the taste of the cupcake
Love the red velvet cupcake here !!!
Yum creme brulee cupcake. Turned out to be highlight of the trip. And free water
The duo is a great deal for a cupcake and scoop of ice creme
Why is it so warm in here??
Very good.... Very rich.
Les saveurs du mois sont mental!!!
Wow the most moist cupcake I have ever had. It's not cheap but you will love every bite of it.
Awesome pumpkin cupcake with cream cheese icing Yum!!!

Prices are a bit steep (~$3 each for a small cup of hot chocolate and a small cup of cappuccino), but they're strong in taste.

A good stop to make after visiting the basilica!
Outstanding cupcakes and Gelato style ice cream
Bring cash or debit card - credit cards not taken here.
Free cupcake day October 15th all day for their 7th anniversary at all les Glaceurs location
Nice lobby!!
Here for Baton Rouge! Dads nite!
Under going major renovations! Food court moving, new ceramics and what I've heard is Simons will be opening.
Bargain hunting! But not on an empty stomach :)
It's warm here.  Heat not working at la cage on st Paul today.
Braised Pork Shank is awesome
Le varlet la brune
Came in to watch Euro semi. Will let you know about beers (brewed on site).
Basic pub food with a slant towards German. It was ok but not why I came to Montreal.

Great bar. Nice vibe. Awesome home brews. I had the 4-beer sampler to taste their brews and all of them was pretty good. Went for a pint of their "Blanche" afterwards, perfectly refreshing on a hot day.
My first time in old town and well worth the visit!
Food was good. Services great. Beer good.
Good food, good beer, awesome atmosphere. Try it!
You don't need to be hungry to eat here. Because by the time your food arrives you will be.
You have to order a spot of tucker of you want to drink outside, but a plate of frîtes will suffice. Beer is brewed on site. One of three in the chain.
Amazing kids section
The entrance is located in the building adjacent to loblaws. Look for the joe banner!
One of Montreal's best brunch!
Just a hotel restaurant, but the breakfast is quite good. Crepes are the way to go.
The ginger beef with chicken fried rice are such a delicious combo !
Get the Pekin Duck with crepes
The best cantoniese chow meing in Montreal!!
Soupe a l oignon MIAM
C est de l excellente bouffe

This place is so delicious. Everything is fresh and their quiche is the best I've ever had. They have amazing pastries, breads, desserts, sandwiches, and coffee beverages. The staff are all awesome also.
Just FYI, the address given I thought it was a brick and mortar store in Montreal. Wrote this address down and walked over there. Well, it's the warehouse for the business. Don't be confused.
La terrasse en été, la cheminée en hiver, de vrais atouts.
La cheminée
Nice terrasse and renovated interior
Amazing Lunch Pre Fixe Menu for $16! Large portions with lots of options
Slow service, below average expensive food
Good soup and average main dishes
Food is really very average but their dessert the pudding with vanilla ice cream is drooling good
Coke products where you can drink all you want before you board your flight

Get your burger, fries and drink here instead of at the sit down restaurant next door where the burger will cost you $$$ instead of $$. Taste as good if not better than US. Would be a 5 if there were more fries, 4+/5
Love that they take American Express. Most every shop or restaurant take only Visa and Mastercard.
If you get the combo meal you can substitute the soda for a bottle of Montclair water.
Overpriced airport food.  Quality is questionable.
